title: Anyone else get super painful losing streaks?
body:
I played 7 games today in unranked and every single one was a loss. It's really discouraging me to press "play again" cause it just feels like I'm signing up for another beatdown. 

Even my last game I played ADC for the first time in at least 4 months and it was pretty fun. I was thinking "wow I might finally win a game today", and then the enemy makes a comeback, takes a few good team fights in a row and we lose. 

I was hoping to practice before playing my ranked placement matches but now I just have zero motivation to play them. Anyone else ever feel like this?
